DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim of this study was to determine the accuracy of an infrared thermometer compared to the gold standard, mercury-in-glass thermometer. The secondary aim was to compare tympanic and axillary temperature measurements by evaluating agreement and correlation to determine whether an infrared tympanic thermometer can replace an axillary mercury thermometer in the emergency department.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Accuracy and Reliability of Infrared Tympanic Thermometer in an Adult Emergency Department
